nodes.text: Kirmay clan's farm was an establishment owned by the Kirmay clan and located on the Mid Rim planet Qiilura by 22 BBY. In that year, Ghez Hokan, a Mandalorian mercenary hired by the Confederacy of Independent Systems, overtook the farm and sold the Kirmay clan to Trandoshan slavers. The farm was then repurposed as a staging ground for fifty to sixty of Hokan's mercenaries, as estimated by a Qiiluran villager.
Kirmay clan's farm, albiet unnamed, was first mentioned in the 2004 novel Republic Commando: Hard Contact, written by Karen Traviss.
